sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SALSES, a very ſtrong caſtle of France, in Rouſſillon, on the confines of Languedoc. It was taken from the Spaniards by the French in 1642; and is ſeated on a lake of the ſame name, among mountains, 10 miles north of Perignan. E. Long. 3. 0. N. Lat. 43. 35.
